instructions_to_main_agent: Strictly follow the 'Angular frontend (not React)' constraint.
Use SCSS for component-specific styles but leverage Tailwind utility classes for layout and spacing where possible.
Ensure the dashboard is responsive (stack columns on tablet < 1024px).
Use the specified 'Deep Blue' (#0F172A) as the primary brand color. Do not use gradients for the main background.
Implement the 'AI Insights' panel as a distinct section with a slightly different visual treatment (e.g., subtle indigo accent) to separate it from raw ERP data.
Ensure high density in data grids. Use 'py-2 px-4' for table cells.
Add a 'Last Updated' timestamp in the header to reinforce real-time data relevance.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects only for overlays (like modals or dropdowns), not for main cards.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover states on rows, buttons).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable for the overall container, but keep data grids dense.
